text: Kateryna D. Makova is an American biologist, currently the Francis R. and Helen M. Pentz Professor of Biology in the Eberly College of Science at Pennsylvania State University. She is also a published author, being widely cited by her peers and widely held in libraries. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:21st-century American biologists Category:Pennsylvania State University faculty
title: Kateryna Makova
